Configuration Handler

class code_quality_analyzer.config_handler.ConfigHandler(config_path)[source]

Bases: object

A class to handle configuration loading and management for code quality analysis.

This class is responsible for loading threshold values from a YAML configuration file and providing access to these thresholds for different types of code smells.

config_path

The path to the YAML configuration file.

Type:

str

thresholds

A dictionary containing threshold values for different types of code smells.

Type:

dict

get_thresholds(smell_type)[source]

Get threshold values for a specific type of code smell.

Parameters:

smell_type (str) – The type of code smell (‘code_smells’, ‘architectural_smells’, or ‘structural_smells’).

Returns:

A dictionary of threshold values for the specified smell type.

Returns an empty dictionary if the smell type is not found.

Return type:

dict

load_thresholds()[source]

Load threshold values from the YAML configuration file.

This method reads the configuration file and extracts threshold values for different types of code smells.

Returns:

A dictionary containing threshold values for different types of code smells.

Return type:

dict
